Class DBHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • is.silverberg.smartgymandroid.DBHandler

  • public class DBHandler
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    Test class DBHandler handles local SQLite database connections.

    Kjartan B. Kristjansson
